allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix broken links, missing images, and placeholder URLs across site

- Fix dean-camper-logo-main.png → dean-camper-logo.png in 9 practice area pages \(image was missing\)
- Fix wrongful-death-claims.html → wrongful-death.html in 6 footer/nav links and wrongful-death.html OG URL
- Fix deanandcamper.com → deancamper.com in contact.html \(canonical, OG tags, JSON-LD, email\)
- Fix yoursite.com placeholder canonical URLs in 5 location pages and header-with-logo.html
- Fix mobile_al page: was duplicated FWB content; corrected title, description, canonical, and body content for Mobile AL
- Simplify header-with-logo.html logo srcset to remove references to non-existent size variants

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add homepage index.html with all 10 practice area cards

- Full sticky header with top phone bar \(all 4 numbers\) and dropdown nav
- Hero section with stats \($50M+, 25+ years, 500+ cases, 5 offices\)
- Trust bar \(Super Lawyers, Multi-Million Dollar Advocates, No Fee pledge\)
- 10 individual practice area cards, each linking to the correct page:
  Car, Truck, Motorcycle, Boat, Wrongful Death, Premises Liability,
  Defective Products, Dog Bites, Auto Insurance Claims, Other Injuries
- Why Choose Us section \(4 feature blocks\)
- Verdicts & Settlements results grid
- Attorney cards for Shane Dean and Chad Camper with credentials
- 5-location office grid linking to each city page
- Contact CTA with all 4 phone numbers and contact.html link
- Full footer with all practice area, firm, location, and phone links
- JSON-LD LegalService schema, Open Graph, Twitter Card, geo meta tags
- Mobile-responsive with hamburger menu and scroll fade-in animations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(~/.ssh/config << 'EOF'

Host github-personal
    HostName github.com
    User git
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_github_personal
    IdentitiesOnly yes
EOF)
Bash(Si Habla Español" retained as supporting text:*)
